shortdesc.ph: Blur level of custom background image.
Degree of background blur for custom background image.
Degree of background blur for custom background images.
Blur level of the custom background image.

plentry.pd: 1: Low blur level for the custom background image. Users can almost clearly see the background.
2: Medium blur level for the custom background image. Users have difficulty seeing the background clearly.
3: (Default) High blur level for the custom background image. Users can barely see the background.
1: Low blur level for custom background image. Users can almost clearly see the background.
2: Medium blur level for custom background image. Users have difficulty seeing the background clearly.
3: (Default) High blur level for custom background image. Users can barely see the background.
1: Low degree of background blur. Users can almost clearly see the background.
2: Medium degree of background blur. Users have some difficulty seeing the background clearly.
3: (Default) High degree of background blur. Users can barely see the background.
1: Low blur level for the custom background image. The background is still somewhat visible to the user.
2: Medium blur level for the custom background image. The background is harder to distinguish.
3: (Default) High blur level for the custom background image. The background is barely visible.
